page.title: 08Pop Culture
page.content: {Pop music}uses a lot of electronic instruments and machines. Guitars and synthesisers are the most popular. Most music is made by a{group}with drums, guitars and keyboard including a synthesisers as the principal sounds. Many{groups}play their music all over the world to large audiences. In their stage shows there are lots of light effects and lasers. Scarborough's Futurist Theatre is often a venue for{pop groups.}The {groups}hire articulated lorries to ferry their expensive equipment. Along with these are a crew of technicians who prepare and service it all. The tickets for a show can range from Â£2 to Â£10. Many{groups}dye their hair different colours and dress in odd ways. Young people copy the{groups and dance in one of Scarborough's many discos till early morning.
